Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the women in the photograph were holding a sign that read "Women of the Democrat Party." The original sign actually read "Lancaster County."
Falters at times: The claim falters by misrepresenting the wording on the sign held by the women in the photograph.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a digitally manipulated version of the original photograph.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the women in the photograph were affiliated with the Democratic Party based on the manipulated sign.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the photograph, which is that it depicts a branch of the KKK from Lancaster County, Pennsylvania, arriving in Washington, D.C. for a white supremacist parade.
